name: EMERIT 2 Pack Oversized Padded Camping Chair, 350LB Heavy Duty Quad Fold Chair with Arms, Collapsible Outdoor Chairs with Lumbar Back & Cup Holder
short_description: 【Padded Cmaping Chair】: Coated in 600D polyester fabric with plush padding their seats and backrests for a luxury look and comfy feel.

name: TOBTOS Ultralight Camping Chair, Portable Folding Backpacking Chair, Compact Camping Chair with Carry Bag for Outdoor Camp Hiking Backpack Beach Travel (Green)
short_description: Compact & Portable: TOBTOS camping chair is very compact and lightweight, only weighing 2.8 lbs. It can be folded into 14.9 (L) x 6.3 (W), fit into a handbag, and can be carried around, making it suitable for any outdoor adventure

Stable Frame: The innovative base ensures maximum stability from front to back, side to side, with a weight capacity of up to 330 lbs. Even if you twist your body on the camping chair, it can maintain gravity balance and will not tip over

Widened Design: Our camping chair is wider than regular chairs, providing you with maximum comfort, even if you sit for a long time without feeling tired. And the side storage bag can hold your drinks, phones, and other items

Easy to Install: This portable chair does not have complicated installation steps. You only need to connect the aluminum rod with an elastic band, and the fabric seat cover is exactly located on the four rods. With a little practice, you can install it within 30 seconds

Multiple Occasions: This lightweight camping chair features a foldable frame and removable fabric for easy storage and transportation. Great for anglers, campers and anyone looking for a relaxing trip

name: Camping Chairs, All Aluminum Frame Portable Folding Camp Chair for Adults, Heavy Duty High Back Collapsible with Built-in Pillow, Side Pocket, Carry Bag for Backpacking, Hiking, Beach
short_description: 7075 Aluminum Frame & 600D Oxford Seat Fabric: The SHALLWE folding camping chair features a 7075 aluminum frame, offering both strength and portability. Weight: 3.84 lbs (1.74 kg), Max Load: 300 lbs, making it a heavy-duty camping chair suitable for adults. The 600D Oxford seat fabric ensures enhanced durability and comfort

Easy Setup & Compact Storage: Using our installation tip, this portable camping chair assembles in minutes and stores in the carry bag when not in use. Its compact design is perfect for travel, whether for backpacking trips or storing in your car for beach or park visits

Comfortable High Back Design: Experience superior comfort with the high-back camping chair, designed for optimal support and relaxation. The 22.9-inch (58 cm) back height and built-in pillow offer added neck and back support. These compact camping chairs guarantee comfort wherever you go

Practical Storage & Convenient Features: This portable chair features a side pocket for storing small essentials and a cup holder to keep your drinks within easy reach. The included carry bag ensures effortless transport. These thoughtful design details enhance convenience and elevate your outdoor experience

One Chair, Ready for All Your Outdoor Activities: This folding chair is ideal for backpacking, hiking, beach trips, and more. It can serve as a great lawn chair for relaxing in your backyard or a travel chair for trips. No matter where you are, this chair offers comfort, portability, and durability for all your outdoor needs
product_description: The SHALLWE Folding Camping Chair combines strength, portability, and comfort, making it the perfect companion for all your outdoor adventures. Featuring a robust 7075 aluminum frame, this chair can support up to 300 lbs, ensuring durability while remaining lightweight at just 3.19 lbs (1.45 kg). The high-quality 600D Oxford seat fabric provides superior comfort and long-lasting durability. Designed for ultimate convenience, this camping chair assembles in minutes and stores easily in the carry bag, making it ideal for backpacking trips, beach, or quick park outings. The comfortable high-back design, with a 22.9-inch (58 cm) back height and built-in pillow, offers excellent support for your neck and back. Additional practical features include side pocket and a cup holder to keep your drinks within reach. Whether you're camping, hiking, relaxing in your backyard, or traveling, this folding chair is the perfect solution for portability, comfort, and convenience.

name: Lightweight Camping Chair, Portable Folding Chair for Camp, Backpacking, Beach, Hiking, Outdoors, Picnics, Black
short_description: Say goodbye to wobbly seating! Our backpacking chair's innovative frame design ensures unmatched stability, outperforming traditional crossbar designs. Relax with confidence, knowing your heavy duty folding chairs for outside are solid and resistant to tipping over, even in the midst of exciting moments.

Our compact, lightweight portable chair boasts a minimal storage footprint, making it a breeze to transport. Complete with a convenient carry bag, it's the ideal companion for spontaneous adventures, ensuring you're always prepared for relaxation wherever you go.

Sink into the perfect seating experience with our scientifically crafted seat curvature. With a high weight capacity, our outdoor folding chairs accommodate various body types, making it the go-to choice for everyone seeking comfort and durability during outdoor activities.

Why waste precious moments struggling with complicated assembly? Our folding camp chair sets up in a flash – just 10 seconds, and you're ready to relax. Perfect for camping, beach outings, sports spectacles, motorcycle rides, music festivals, and beyond!

Elevate your outdoor experience with our folding camping chair featuring two adjustable heights. Whether you're enjoying a serene sunset or cheering at a lively sports event, switch between high or low seat profile effortlessly. Perfect for adults, kids, and even your furry friends!

name: 2 Pack Lightweight Camping Chairs for Adults & Teens, 250LBS Capacity Foldable Portable Chairs with Carry Bag, Compact Design for Camping, Beach, Picnics, and Outdoor Events
short_description: Ultra-Lightweight Double Pack：Includes 2 compact camping chairs (each weighs only 3.6lbs) with individual carry bags, perfect for couples, friends, or families to enjoy outdoor adventures together.

250LBS Reinforced Support：Upgraded high-strength steel frame and 600D Oxford fabric ensure a tested capacity of 250LBS (113kg), ideal for teens and lightweight adults. (Note: Earlier models supported 200LBS; current version is upgraded for enhanced durability.)
3-Second Fold & Go Design：Folds into a compact 24”x5” size, easily fits in car trunks or backpacks. The included carry bag with handle and drawstring closure makes transportation effortless.
Ergonomic Comfort：Contoured seat design with breathable fabric provides back support, perfect for relaxing at campsites, beaches, or backyard BBQs.
Versatile for All Outdoor Lifestyles：From hiking and fishing to music festivals and patio parties, these chairs suit users up to 6’. Not recommended for users over 250LBS.
